item.title: Useful Command Line Tools
item.author: cyrusncy@gmail.com (CyrusN)
item.description: Basic Redirect operators # pipe echo "hello world" | sed 's/ /_/' # redirect the standard output result to file (replace) echo "hello world" > test.txt # redirect the standard output result to file (append) echo "hello world" >> test.txt # redirect file to standard input # e.g. replace all space to _ in text.txt and save to a new file sed 's/ /_/g' < test.txt > test_1.txt # line input cat << end heredoc> hello heredoc> world heredoc> end Create multiple files or folders mkdir sa{1.
